additionalServices.name: Home Delivery
additionalServices.description: The vehicle will be delivered to the address you specified, within 15 km of the district boundaries of the selected office, within working hours.

additionalServices.name: Return from Address
additionalServices.description: The vehicle will be returned within working hours from the address you specified, within the boundaries of the 15 km district of the selected office.

additionalServices.name: Additional Driver
additionalServices.description: Every driver who will drive the vehicle must be in the contract. Otherwise, the insurance and contract conditions will be invalid.

additionalServices.name: GPS
additionalServices.description: In case of suitability, the fee to be made in the office is 59 ₺ per day for 1 piece.

additionalServices.name: Baby Seat
additionalServices.description: It is obligatory to use an infant/child car seat during the journey of babies and children under a certain age and weight in the vehicle.

additionalServices.name: Assurance Package
additionalServices.description: It allows your reservation to be canceled without deduction if requested before the pick up time.

additionalServices.name: Roadside Assistance Assistant
additionalServices.description: It allows your reservation to be canceled without deduction if requested before the pick up time.
